hadiths.text: It was narrated from ‘Abdullah bin ‘Amr that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said:“The first signs to appear will be at the rising of the sun from the west and the emergence of the Beast to the people, at forenoon.’” 'Abdullah said: "Whichever of them appears first, the other will come soon after." 'Abdullah said: "I do not think it will be anything other than the sun rising from the west
